meta.description: Dr. Paul Farmer dedicates his life and career to delivering medical treatment in Third World countries, saving countless lives in places like Haiti and Rwanda. Byron Pitts reports.

title: Watch 60 Minutes: Dr. Farmer's Remedy - Full show on CBS
cleaned_text: Dr. Paul Farmer dedicates his life and career to delivering medical treatment in Third World countries, saving countless lives in places like Haiti and Rwanda. Byron Pitts reports. Air Date: May 4, 2008
